question: Out of every 100 people in [Country], about how many do you think have access to the internet at home either through a computer or mobile device?

Out of every 100 people in [Country], about how many do you think do not affiliate themselves with any religion – that is, atheists, agnostics and those who say they do not identify with any religion?
How old do you think the average person in [country] is?
Out of every 100 people in [Country], about how many do you think are aged 14 or younger?
What proportion of [country’s] total household wealth do you think the wealthiest 1% own?
Out of every 100 people aged 20 years or over in [Country], how many do you think are either overweight or obese?
What percentage of [politicians in lower or single house – eg in Britain would be Members of Parliament (MPs)] in [Country] are women?
What percentage of people in your country live in a rural area, that is, outside of a big town or city?
What percentage of the [Country] population do you think are immigrants to this country (i.e. not born in [Country])?
Out of every 100 working-age women in [Country], about how many do you think are in employment?
Out of every 100 young adults aged 25-34  in [Country], about how many do you think live with their parents?
